title: The Double-decked 'strato' clipper
creator_credit: MPO Productions and Pan American World Airways
brief_description: Designed to acquaint the public with the facilities provided for speedy and comfortable air travel by modern airliners, this film observes the operation of a Boeing double-decked airliner, the “Strato-cruiser”. Includes also an account of the development of trans-oceanic air travel and of the Boeing/Pan Am aircraft, pre and post WWII.
